channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: The 2025 Coney Island Mermaid Parade in (NSFW) pics
item.description: 🧜‍♀️🎶 Dive into the vibrant sights of the 2025 Coney Island Mermaid Parade! Let the music and mermaids transport you! 🌊✨ #MermaidParade #MusicMagic

item.title: Watch Dua Lipa and Charli XCX Perform ‘360’ in London
item.description: 🔥 Catch Dua Lipa and Charli XCX heating up London with their ‘360’ performance! 🎶🌟 #MusicMagic

item.title: Billy Strings Dedicates Concert to Mother Hours After Her Death
item.description: Sending love to Billy Strings 💙🎶 What a heartfelt tribute! Music truly heals the soul. #BillyStrings #MusicHeals

item.title: Patrick Walden, Babyshambles Guitarist, Dead at 46
item.description: Rock on, Patrick Walden 🤘 Your music lives forever in our hearts. Rest in power 🎸 #RIPPatrickWalden

item.title: Summer Smash: Yeat, Don Toliver Debut New Songs At First Live Set
item.description: 🔥 Fresh tunes alert! Yeat and Don Toliver bring the heat at their first live set. Let the summer vibes roll! 🎶 #NewMusicAlert #SummerSmash
